 Anyway!

This is a node: 
There are many types of nodes 
For example, this is a --mine-- It produces gems

This is a --gate-- It accepts gems 
It is your goal to get gems to charge the gates 
The gate's battery will be charged ONLY when it has received the correct gem

So, how do we get gems to the gate? 
With connections! 
You can draw a connection with $connection_start$ on a node 
You can end a connection by $connection_end$ on a different node

One last thing: 
You can leave a level or reset it by clicking on the pause icon
Now try making a connection from the mine to the gate!
